divs: Sighting DetailsI had just come home from work and went into back yard to see the dogs. I looked up at the sky N-W and saw two bright lights following each other heading in a S-E direction. They were moving real fast. I watch them till they disappeared. It was like someone turned off the lights. The light was a bright white, no colors. The sighting lasted about 12 seconds.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Monrovia
This sighting has never been favorited.
